long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cookie Connect is a Chrome extension designed to provide access to different subscriptions to our users via our website, it seamlessly transfer data from Meta to optimize your browsing experience. With a focus on enhancing efficiency and personalization, this tool allows you to automatically load and configure key settings from your favorite websites. Perfect for users who want to save time and enjoy a more tailored online experience, Meta Data Loader ensures your settings are consistently applied as you navigate the web.
